item.title: Blue Venom
item.description: Coming down too fast Too fast coming down Fall into your dreams Your dreams you dream about I'll be loving you Loving you, loving you till you die 'Cause I'm giving in Giving in, giving in with my life Forever Blue venom Blue venom Forever Blue venom Blue venom Underground heartbeat Heartbeat underground Got you bonded to your maker Make me perilous I'll be loving you Loving you, loving you till you die 'Cause I'm giving in Giving in, giving in with my life Forever Blue venom Blue venom Forever Blue venom Blue venom Dusk or dawn Light or dark Dusk or dawn Light or dark Dusk or dawn Light or dark Dusk or dawn Light or dark Up and down Down, down On and on, on and on Take me to heaven Take me to hell Yeah, oh, yeah It's running, it's running It's burning through Blue Venom Forever, forever, forever Forever Blue Venom Blue Venom Forever Forever Blue venom Forever Blue venom Forever Blue venom Forever, forever, forever
